summary: Flame Atronach Armor for UNP body
descriptionHtml:
Notice: This mod is incomplete. I had it set to hidden for a long time, intending to fix it. Since that has not happened and I have not been motivated to work on it, I'm putting it back up as-is. Perhaps I will work on it in the future, but I make no promises.

[Game]
Skyrim

[Mod Name]
Flame Atronach Armor for UNP

[Author(s)]
insanityman

[Description]
This is an adaptation of the Flame Atronach armor from Killer Keo's Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set, adapted to fit the UNP body. It can be crafted at a smelter if you have the Intense Flames perk.

Video preview of armor at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=xI0_nGbM4WA#!

Also, if anyone knows how to make a video show up in description, please let me know, because I have no idea.

[Change Log]
v1
-Mod Released
v2
-standalone version created

[Required Files]
Created for UNP, so UNP Textures HIGHLY recommended

[Installation]
Copy Data folder to Skyrim folder. Recommend use Nexus Mod Manager

[Uninstallation]
Remove the files.

[Known Issues]
Probably some minor clipping. I took care of everything that I found, but it is quite probable that I missed something. If you find any clipping, feel free to point them out in the comments.

[Incompatabilities]
Incompatible with other Daedric Armor replacers

[Compatabilities]
Created for UNP.

[Tools Used]
NifSkope
Blender
Creation Kit

[Permissions]
If you wish to modify this mod, I highly recommend that you start with the file from Killer Keo's mod, so that you won't have to deal with the imperfections related to my hammering away at it in Blender.

[Credits]
Dimon99 for the UNP body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

Killer Keo for the armor mesh
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
author: insanityman
